edu.packt.neuralnet

Class NeuralNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.NeuralNet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kohonen

    public class NeuralNet
extends java.lang.Object
    NeuralNet This class represents the Neural Network itself. It contains all the definitions that a Neural Network has, including method for calculation (forward).
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares

      NeuralNet constructor This constructor initializes the neural network by initializing all of the underlying layers and their respective neurons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeuralNet

        public NeuralNet(int numberofinputs,
                 int numberofoutputs,
                 int[] numberofhiddenneurons,
                 IActivationFunction[] hiddenAcFnc,
                 IActivationFunction outputAcFnc,
                 WeightInitialization _weightInitialization)
        NeuralNet constructor This constructor initializes the neural network by initializing all of the underlying layers and their respective neurons.
        Parameters:
        numberofinputs - Number of Inputs of this Neural Network
        numberofoutputs - Number of Outputs of this Neural Network
        numberofhiddenneurons - Array containing the number of Neurons in each of the Hidden Layers
        hiddenAcFnc - Array containing the activation function of each Hidden Layer
        outputAcFnc - Activation Function of the Output Layer
        _weightInitialization -
